4:
Click the "Insert" button in the toolbar below → select "Caret".

Note: Since "Caret" is done by simply sending "Left arrow" keys, it may not work properly in many applications.
Please report issues with "Caret" only if it does not work in very simple applications such as Notepad (Windows) or TextEdit (macOS).

For example, caret will be placed here <atext contenteditable="false" type="caret">|</atext> after expansion.
